name: Clickreate your Character - R.P.G Edition
description:
Third project developed at the university. A clicker with a typical medieval-fantasy R.P.G. like setting.  Click your character, earn character development and define him. You can also save your progress and continue your adventure later.

It was made with Unity, using additional coding and extra assets (view in game credits). This is a practice not a finish commercial game, therefore expect some issues.
